CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 9, 1961, pg. A12, reads: "Over 500 Attend Junior Mothers' ... 'Smart Affairs of 1961'"
TitMainTitle: Lois Weaver Watson, Betty Tibbs, and June Stokes wearing two piece dance costumes with ruffles around sleeves and skirt posed in interior with leaf patterned carpet and marble baseboards for Junior Mothers' "Smart Affairs of 1961"
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Group portraits--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Dance costume--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Watson, Lois Weaver.Tibbs, Betty.Stokes, June.
